Ingredients.3: 2 small red, green, and/or yellow bell peppers, chopped

Ingredients.4: 1 cup frozen whole kernel corn, thawed

Ingredients.5: 1 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained

Ingredients.7: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Creamy Poblano & Queso Soup

Ingredients.10: 1 medium avocado, pitted, peeled and diced

Directions.1: Heat the oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and peppers and cook for 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender-crisp, stirring occasionally.

Directions.2: Add the corn, beans and chicken to the skillet and cook until the mixture is hot. Stir in the soup and milk and heat to a boil. Reduce the heat to low. Cook for 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Squeeze 1 teaspoon juice from the lime. Place the avocado into a medium bowl. Add the lime juice and toss to coat.

Directions.4: Divide the chicken mixture among the tostada shells. Top with the avocado mixture and cilantro. Season with hot pepper sauce, if desired.
